snippet: This probate petition, filed on July 2, shows that Mr. Gandolfini had property governed by his will of between $1 million and $10 million. But attorneys say his estate is likely worth much more than that, and that he may have done more extensive...
lead_paragraph: This probate petition, filed on July 2, shows that Mr. Gandolfini had property governed by his will of between $1 million and $10 million. But attorneys say his estate is likely worth much more than that, and that he may have done more extensive estate planning than his will suggests.

headline.main: Probate Proceeding for the Will of James Gandolfini
